data.text: @KelSoSwaggerous @Thegirlnamedglo * to control their looks because they were a distraction to white men.
@KelSoSwaggerous @Thegirlnamedglo blonde hair isn't exclusive to white people & no white women have ever had laws created to control their looks & distract white men. it's okay, kelsey.

1.The gene for blonde hair is carried by Eastern Europeans 2.Malanesians are dark skinned w/blonde hair but are islanders not Africans https://t.co/OabfwQTHKC and Celtic warriors also cornrowed their hair for battle.
@Thegirlnamedglo Well. Actually Celtic warriors used to cornrow their hair for battle. So it’s not a hair style exclusion black culture. Looks like you could use some schooling too
@Sean_Harris_LTD I mean double standard. Calm your asses down 😂
